title: Furloughing of workers across UK businesses [18 May to 31 May 2020]
description: Analysis of Wave 6 of the Business Impact of Coronavirus (COVID-19) Survey (BICS). This complements the analysis of BICS by focusing on the workforce furloughed across responding businesses.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest dataset under heading "Your download option".
sizingNotes: Small tables with simple structures, multiple dimensions and footnotes.
notes: Data are provided as an update to "Furloughing of workers across UK businesses: 23 March 2020 to 5 April 2020 ", which was published by ONE as an article on 23/04/2020.
